Deadmau5 Launches New Online Platform Tonight with TESTPILOT Set

Posted by Brittany Prevost on Septemner 4, 2020

During the next few weeks, many of our Flag fam members will attend one of Joel Thomas Zimmerman's (deadmau5) series of Drive-In Experiences in Ottawa and in Montreal. As the anticipation for the events skyrocket, the Canadian entrepreneur has been busy juggling his numerous projects. Among the long list, deadmau5 is officially launching his new online streaming platform www.mau5trap.tv tonight, at 10:00 p.m. EST, with a very special TESTPILOT set!

In 2013, history was made as TESPILOT arose from the shadows. The memorable debut was one that still lives on today. TESTPILOT, AKA Zimmerman's techno alias, performed b2b alongside the legendary Richie Hawtin at SXSW. The infamous techno snobs were left speechless as the sleek sound felt familiar, and ultimately, impressed - especially after years of deadmau5' signature anthems filling the airwaves!

The multi-channel destination is presented in partnership with the interactive streaming platform Maestro and StreamVoodoo. It is the official platform for all things deadmau5, including performances, interviews, BTS content (including mau5trap label artists), gaming and much more! Tickets are on sale now ($10) for the TESTPILOT show and can be purchased here. Don't sleep on this - it's going to EPIC! 

Written By Brittany Prevost
